dc:title: Catholic Worker Program
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recalls her prayer at the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception that God show her a way to use her talents to help labor, Peter Maurin's appearance and inspiration, and the notion of personal responsibility--"Every one can help." Thanks all who have supported the work.
